amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds for the purpose of providing loan guarantees for "carbon capture and sequestration projects".
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds made available by this Act may be used to carry out projects described in section 1703(b)(5) of the Energy Policy Act of 2005 (42 U.S.C 16513(b)(5)).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A078) Failed by recorded vote: 68 - 351 (Roll no. 597).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A078) Failed by recorded vote: 68 - 351 (Roll no. 597).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A078) offered by Mr. Rohrabacher.
